org.melior.client.smpp

Class SmppClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.melior.client.core.ClientConfig
      • org.melior.client.smpp.SmppClientConfig
        • org.melior.client.smpp.SmppClient

  • public class SmppClient
extends SmppClientConfig
    Implements an easy to use, auto-configuring SMPP client with connection pooling.

    The client writes timing details to the logs while dispatching SMPP requests to the SMSC implementation. The client automatically converts any exception that occurs during communication with the SMSC implementation into a standard RemotingException.

    Since:
    2.3
    Author:
    Melior
